statements: DELETE FROM customers WHERE customer_name = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM Customers WHERE customer_id = 500 AND customer_email = 'test@example.com';
DELETE FROM sales WHERE sale_amount > 1000 AND sale_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM engagements WHERE engagement_type = 'Meeting' AND engagement_date >= '2022-05-01';
DELETE FROM sales WHERE sale_amount > 1000 AND quantity < 5;
DELETE FROM orders WHERE order_date < '2022-01-01' AND total_amount <= 500.00;
DELETE FROM products WHERE price > 100.50 AND category = 'Electronics';
